translations: n.专辑，影集（album 的复数形式）；相簿，相册

sentences.sentence: His albums are available on tape and CD.
sentences.translation: 他的歌曲专辑有磁带和光盘出售。

sentences.sentence: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.translation: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

sentences.sentence: My dad had to buy CDs of all the albums he already owned on vinyl.
sentences.translation: 我爸爸就是要买他已有的所有黑胶唱片的CD版。
